extension.menu:
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Trakt Manager
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Rescrape Item
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Clear Providers
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Find Similar
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Series
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Episodes
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode)
-->

extension.description: Browse The MovieDb, The TVDb, Trakt and pass info along to library or an addon. Needs player-files and the appropriate addon to play the files.
extension.news: 1.4.14 - Fix bug with missing ID in TV menus 1.4.13 - Added realtitle (movies) and realname (tvshows) parameters for plexkodiconnect compatibility 1.4.12 - Handle non-existent 'filename' key in TVDB data. 1.4.11 - TVDB API fix, thanks to @ruinernin and @bg-22 (among others)! BUG: Some artwork may not load for certain items, due to ongoing API instability. 1.4.10 - Added language option for player-files (TV) 1.4.9 - Fix art in TV menus 1.4.8 - Fix crash from empty "first_aired" string" 1.4.7 - Fix crash when we can't contact TVDB 1.4.6 - Fix crashes from non-existent keys 1.4.5 - Added default play action, options for movies are; Play/OpenInfo and options for episodes are; Play/OpenInfo(TV Show info)/OpenInfo(Episode info). 1.4.4 - Fix clearlogo for movies 1.4.3 - Fix typo in season fanart request. 1.4.2 - Add fanart caching 1.4.1 - Fix season artwork 1.4.0 - Add unwatched counts for shows/seasons. 1.3.2 - Fix "Upcoming Episodes" and "Next Episodes". 1.3.1 - Fixed "Next Page" bug with widgets.

extension.summary: A Clean Source To Dirty Things...
extension.description: Movies, Tv Shows, Anime, and What Not. [CR]See Settings for the Help/About tab. [CR]See bottom of Main Menu for Show Changelog Option. [CR]Providers are now sorted different in the settings and all the best normal ones are enabled. [CR]Disabled by Default: Debrid/Prem/Torr and a 'Sloppy' Stack too, Enable the ones you want from these sections in the settings. [CR]Instead of being confused with all those choices half enabled i decided to go another way. [CR]You enable/disable the ones you dont like and let me handle the broken providers. [CR]How it should be :)
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. The author does not host or own any content found within this addon.[CR]The author is in no way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, or the XBMC Foundation.[CR]This is a Non-profit resource, organized solely for educational purposes which is protected under the Fair-Use doctrine of the Copyright Act, Specifically section 107, which does promote freedom of expression, by permitting the unlicensed use of copyright-protected works.
extension.license: Free the People!, Free the World!!
extension.news: [B] Total CleanUp of EN Providers[/B]: Checked and all good as of 08-24-2019. [CR][B] (If a non-en provider is broken let me know, as i dont bother with em.)[/B] [CR][B] (Please Report Any Issues To Me Directly. Details Are in Settings.)[/B]

extension.summary: TheMovieDb Helper - Now With Trakt Support!
extension.description: TheMovieDb Helper provides details about movies, tvshows and actors from TMDb. Users can access a variety of lists from TMDb and Trakt.
extension.news: 2.2.73 - Trakt Error fix[CR]2.2.72 - Some playlist fixes[CR]2.2.71 - Add URL encode options for player values[CR]2.2.70 - NextAired Library Improvements use Trakt[CR]2.2.69 - LMAO - Browse seasons[CR]2.2.68 - Fix trakt context for episodes[CR]2.2.67 - Add day to next aired labels[CR]2.2.66 - Some next aired library tweeks[CR]2.2.65 - Add play using context menu[CR]2.2.64 - Library next aired[CR]2.2.63 - Sort userlists by added date instead of rating[CR]2.2.62 - Add regions for release dates[CR]2.2.61 - Relative release dates in discover[CR]2.2.60 - Add release type selection in discover[CR]2.2.59 - Expose Trakt context addremove function[CR]2.2.58 - Add search history caching[CR]2.2.57 - Add feedback for adding items to watchlist etc.[CR]2.2.56 - Add Videos section to details[CR]2.2.55 - Fix for TraktAPI false positives getting slug[CR]2.2.54 - Potential fix for Trakt management options to only show if auth[CR]2.2.53 - Another fix for resolving url bugs - NOTICE: Users should re-add old strm files[CR]2.2.52 - Add autoupdate on startup option for library added shows[CR]2.2.51 - Flatten seasons option[CR]2.2.50 - Add season and episode numbers to episodes[CR]2.2.49 - Separate unaired movies/episodes option[CR]2.2.48 - Remove TMDB/Fanart develop key expert options as children can't help but get their sticky fingers all over it even after being told not to touch[CR]2.2.47 - Better clearing of service monitor properties[CR]2.2.46 - Fix for fanarttv on episode widgets[CR]2.2.45 - Add option to show next page item on widgets[CR]2.2.44 - Potential fix for both strm and widget player resolve[CR]2.2.43 - Fix for mostwatched shows/movies not reaching limit[CR]2.2.42 - Fix for unwatched episode counts[CR]2.2.41 - Remove resolveurl to prevent crashing bug and add fixes for fanarttv: Episode artwork plus connection error loop[CR]2.2.39/40 - Add role to label2[CR]2.2.38 - Expand Trakt list limit option[CR]2.2.37 - Add throwaway var to attempt fix for _strptime import bug[CR]2.2.36 - Possible fix for old settings format log spam[CR]2.2.35 - Potential fix for datetime bug in py2[CR]2.2.34 - Fix for plugin failed to play error[CR]2.2.33 - Fix for context menu trakt management of tvshows[CR]2.2.32 - Fix for trakt collection url not resolving to details[CR]2.2.31 - Add option to disable folder creation check[CR]2.2.30 - Reattempt create filepath as possible fix for false failure report[CR]2.2.29 - Only skip TMDbHelper .strm files in local library[CR]2.2.28 - Add options for add to library path[CR]2.2.26/27 - Fixes for add to library[CR]2.2.25 - Formatting future episodes fix[CR]2.2.24 - Browse Trakt Collection[CR]2.2.23 - Add to Kodi Library function[CR]2.2.22 - Player now ignores strm files in local library[CR]2.2.21 - Improvements to In-Progress[CR]2.2.20 - Add option to hide unaired episodes/movies. Format unaired episode/movie labels to red italic[CR]2.2.19 - Additional artwork types from kodilibrary[CR]2.2.18 - Cleanup and clear some empty keys[CR]2.2.17 - Add person kodidb stats to service monitor[CR]2.2.16 - Fix service monitor for people[CR]2.2.14/5 - playmedia param for close dialog[CR]2.2.13 - Extra checks to prevent double adding[CR]2.2.11 - Add Rule improvements to Discover[CR]2.2.10 - Move stats to infoproperties[CR]2.2.9 - DB Stats for Person[CR]2.2.8 - Use select dialog instead of container for discover method[CR]2.2.7 - Add discover select boxes[CR]2.2.6 - Fix for unicode error in add_query params[CR]2.2.5 - Expose discover method for users[CR]2.2.4 - Cleanup for window manager service monitor[CR]2.2.3 - Add close dialog option[CR]2.2.2 - Add Gender Field[CR]2.2.1 - Additional Sets Properties[CR]2.2.0 - Call Auto method for handling extendedinfo experience

extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!
extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v3.6.0 - April 2, 2020[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Compressed artwork to lessen footprint.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added new setting to enable or disable Calendar (TVMaze) extended meta. When disabled(default) the Calendar list items will now load faster without the extra meta and artwork.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] resolveURL is now maintained by gural so repo has been updated.[/I]

[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime [B]0.4.6:[/B] - Add-on re-enabled. Their site is back to letting free users watch videos. - To avoid overwhelming their servers on these COVID-19 quarantine times, the "autoplay highest quality" add-on setting was removed. So when you play a video, you'll always be asked what quality to use.
[B]0.4.5:[/B] - Temporary disabling of the add-on. If the source site ever comes back, we can enable it again.
[B]0.4.4:[/B] - Added an "About" button to the Trakt tab of the add-on settings, explaining how to use it.
[B]0.4.3:[/B] - Fixed the series and episode search.
[B]0.4.2:[/B] - Added a [B]Tools[/B] category to the settings. Each tool brings up a confirmation dialog explaining how they work, so you can read before using. - Tools added: Restore Watched Episodes, Update Favourites. - Minor fix to movie titles.
[B]0.4.1:[/B] - Changed to a WatchCartoonOnline domain that's updated more frequently. - Fix for letters in episode numbers (when using the "Clean Episode Titles" option).
[B]0.4.0:[/B] - Fix for when there's weird season ordinals in the episode titles.
[B]0.3.9:[/B] - Fix for when there's blank lists on the mobile website.
[B]0.3.8:[/B] - Fix for when using favorite items with the old website address.
[B]0.3.7:[/B] - Fixed thumbnail images with the Show Information context menu.
extension.description:
Watch cartoons and anime from [COLOR orange][B]www.TheWatchCartoonOnline.tv[/B][/COLOR].
Support the WatchCartoonOnline website with a PayPal donation to: [COLOR khaki][B]wcohelp@yandex.com[/B][/COLOR]
Add-on by doko.

extension.description: HD Animes

extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WS Beta[/B][/COLOR] [B]0.2.0:[/B] - Added a "Last Watched" menu item. - Added support for InputStream Adaptive. This lets you watch the Auto (DASH) sources. See the "Playback" category of the add-on settings for how to enable this.
[B]0.1.2:[/B] - Fixed a bug with the A-Z category.
[B]0.1.1:[/B] - Removed the Connection:keep-alive header, it was causing trouble.
[B]0.1.0:[/B] - Initial release.

extension.news: Improved add-on by OpenSubtitles.org v5.2.14 (2017-01-23) - Users are able to download subtitles as anonymous without authentication. Added localized descriptions, media files - New feature: Users are able to check for subtitles when Kodi is not playing, by using the manual search or by standing on an item and opening the subtitles search dialog (By key or by an external addon) | @burekas
